alert.note: Alert for Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:16PM MDT until June 23 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TOOELE COUNTY... At 515 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Dugway English Village, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Weather station reported gusts to 66 mph. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Vernon, Tooele Army Depot South, Skull Valley, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range and Rush Valley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
